trans-unit.target: Kuhusu Kielelezo cha Kalenda ya Ukuta

trans-unit.source: Using this template, you can make an A5-size 12 month calendar, with a picture and quotation on the top page, and days on the bottom. The calendar will use the names of months and days in your language.
trans-unit.target: Kwa kutumia kielelezo hiki, unaweza kutengeneza kalenda ya miezi 12 ya A5, iliyo na picha na dondoo kwenye ukurasa wa juu, na siku upande wa chini. Kalenda hii itatumia majina ya miezi na siku katika lugha yako.

trans-unit.source: Currently, you cannot make a "shell" for other languages to use.
trans-unit.target: Kwa sasa, huwezi ukatengeneza "sheli" ili kutumika kwa lugha zingine.

trans-unit.source: Thanks to Bruce Cox (SIL Cameroon) for getting this template started.
trans-unit.target: Shukrani kwa Bruce Cox (SIL Cameroon) kwa kuanzisha kielelezo hiki.
